"Xiera":
"ゾンディールについて
説明します！"

"ゾンディールは雷属性のテクニックで
電磁場を発生させてエネミーを
一箇所に引き寄せることができます。"

"それでは、ゾンディールを使って
エネミーを引き寄せてみましょう！"
"・Cast Zondeel with <%PhotonArts> to gather all enemies into one place"
"・Cast Zondeel with <%PhotonArts> to gather all enemies into one place"

"Zondeel is a Lightning-attribute Technique which generates an electromagnetic field that draws nearby enemies into its center.

After the initial cast, it continues to draw enemies in for a short time.

Casting another Lightning-attribute Technique within the area of an active Zondeel causes it to explode and disappear."
